General.Name: Concordia Financial Group Ltd
General.Description: Concordia Financial Group, Ltd. provides various banking products and services to small and medium-sized businesses and individuals. The company offers various deposit and loan products; and securities, leasing, survey research and other information, venture capital, and other financial services. It operates through a network of branches, sub-branches, ATMs, and representative offices in Japan and internationally. Concordia Financial Group, Ltd. was incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
